comment: She was a little unclear with her lectures at times. She is a quirky, yet nice lady and she always is there for the students. I'm good at history, but I made C's on all of the tests. She offered bonus points each time, so I got lower B's. Made 100's on Participation and short responses and ended up with a rounded up 90. I would take her again.
Her class was easy. I made A's on all three tests and the papers you have to write are not that bad. just read the book. By the way the class is REALLY BORING but easy

She was a weird woman. Her lectures are all over the place and it seemed hard for her to stay focused on the subject matter. The tests were straight forward if you paid attention, unfortunately I didn't because the lectures were extremely dull. You have to go to class every day. Gives terms to study before every test. Final isn't cumulative.

Eh. Class was very boring overall. You don't HAVE to read. Her lectures cover most of the material well. For the typical student, you will get a high B or low A. She does give small extra credit oppurtunities. Overall, just a normal class.  Does give a daily participation grade.

She's a pretty decent teacher, pretty nerdy but adorable at the same time. However, I wouldn't take her again. You need the textbooks. Tests are so-so. Got an 85 on the first, and a 75 on the second. Just pay attention and try not to skip too often.
3 exams. 1 geography quiz. long lectures but very interesting. She is hilarious but does sign in sheets every class except for days she has exit tickets or tests. I would take her again.

Professor Weksler is a great professor. she does exactly what the students want a teacher to do. she does not assign homework, 2 short responses, 3 tests(you get study guides with all the terms on them), and wants the students to succeed in her class. I like Professor Weksler because she understands what students want in a course and delivers it.

Her lectures are hilarious, and she gives so many opportunities for students to raise their grade. No group projects. If you put forth the effort, you can receive an A in her class. I would take again.
